sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
dark
, ni dovolj svetlobe, da bi dobro videli.

seg.quote: Luckily it was too dark for anyone to see me blushing.
The room was dark and empty.
The lights went out and the hall was plunged into darkness.

sense.def:
The dark
je pomanjkanje svetlobe v prostoru.

seg.quote: He was sitting in the dark at the back of the theatre.

sense.def:
Kar je
dark
, je take barve, kot so videti vse stvari, kadar so v senci.

Kdor je
dark
, ima rjave ali črne lase in pogosto tudi rjavo kožo.

seg.quote: He was a tall, dark, and undeniably handsome man.

sense.def:
obdobje, ki je
dark
, je neprijetno ali grozljivo.

Pogledi ali pripombe, ki so
dark
, dajejo slutiti, da se bo zgodilo nekaj strašnega.

seg.quote: Another of the men hinted darkly that there would be violence.

sense.def:
Če nekaj storimo
before dark
, tisto storimo, preden zaide sonce. Če nekaj storimo
after dark
, tisto storimo, ko se noč že začne.

To be in the dark about something
pomeni, da o nečem nečesa ne vemo.
